name: get-alarm-summary-ack
description: Represents a BACnet GetAlarmSummary service acknowledgment, which returns a series of alarm summaries containing object identifiers, alarm states, and acknowledgment status.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the object in alarm.

fields.name: alarm-state
fields.description: The current alarm state of the object.

fields.name: acknowledged-transitions
fields.description: Bit flags indicating which alarm transitions have been acknowledged.
